alert.note: Alert for Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Suwannee County through 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dowling Park to near Mayo. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Dowling Park and Luraville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
